Linear Regression

This section covers Linear Regression in Machine Learning.

Key Concepts

  • Hypothesis function
  • Cost function
  • Gradient descent
  • Normal equation

Mathematical Foundation

The hypothesis function for linear regression: \(h_\theta(x) = \theta_0 + \theta_1 x_1 + \theta_2 x_2 + ... + \theta_n x_n\)

Cost function (Mean Squared Error): \(J(\theta) = \frac{1}{2m} \sum_{i=1}^{m} (h_\theta(x^{(i)}) - y^{(i)})^2\)

Gradient descent update rule: \(\theta_j := \theta_j - \alpha \frac{\partial}{\partial \theta_j} J(\theta)\)
